categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Padija Anjeri was a anthropologist and operative for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The daughter of Jedi Colonel Tyneir Renz, Anjeri studied at the University of Alderaan where she was recruited into the Alliance by Professor Oll Maccabe. Anjeri worked as a recovery agent, rescuing relics and artifacts from historical sites destroyed by the Galactic Empire. During a mission to Omman Minor, Anjeri hired the smuggler Drake Paulsen to transport her off-world after she recovered an idol important to the Twi'lek Nercathi clan.
